summary: A man spends years alone on a space station orbiting Earth after losing communication with Houston/Earth. Time is spent on maintenance, exercise, watching old messages and reading a journal by a soldier in the American civil war 1864.
cast: Gunner Wright|Corey Richardson|Bradley Horne|Nancy Stelle|Roger E. Fanter|Jesse Hotchkiss|Troy Mittleider|Brid Caveney|Ambyr Childers|B. Anthony Cohen|James C. title: Love
